TEXT.FORM:
kɯɕɯŋgɯ tɕe, nɤki, kɯβʁa ra ɣɯ, nɤki, kɯtɕapɯ ra kɯ, tshitsuku ʑo nɯ-ma ɯ-kɯ-nɤma, tɕe tshitsuku ʑaka ɣɯ nɯ-kɯ-ra nɯra, ɯ-kɯ-wum, ɯ-kɯ-kho pjɤ-ra. (010) XXX tɕe nɯra ʑakastaka nɯ-ma pjɤ-tu tɕe. tɕendɤre tɯɕoʁ kɤ-ti pjɤ-tu tɕe, tɯɕoʁ nɯra kɯ tɕe, tɯjpu ɲɯ-kho-nɯ, tu-sprɤt-nɯ, tɕe kɯβʁa ra nɯ-ma tɕhi kɯ-ra nɯra ɲɯ-nɤma-nɯ pjɤ-ŋgrɤl. nɯ tɯɕoʁ pjɤ-ŋu. thoχtɤmpa kɤ-ti pjɤ-tu tɕe, nɯnɯra kɯ tɕe, ɯrkoz ʑo nɯ-jpu nɯ ʁɟa ʑo pɯ-kɤ-khrɤt tɕe, XXX nɯ kɯ-fse tu-kho-nɯ pjɤ-ra. tɕe nɯra thoχtɤmpa pjɤ-rmi-nɯ. tɕe nɯ kɯ-fse ʑakastaka ʑo nɯ-ma pɯ-kɤ-khrɤt pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, nɯra kho-nɯ, sprɤt-nɯ pjɤ-ra. XXX
nɯ-jpu nɯra, nɤkinɯ, thoχtɤm ta-wum-nɯ tɕe, nɯra ɯ-kɯ-nɯzʁe pjɤ-ra. tɕe tsuku kɯ tɕe tu-fkur-nɯ ju-tsɯm-nɯ pjɤ-ra, tsuku kɯ tu-ɣɯɕkat-nɯ tɕe ju-tsɯm-nɯ pjɤ-ra. nɯ kɯ-fse ʑakastaka ʑo nɯ-ma pjɤ-tu.
